title: ‘Progress Is Not Always Linear, It’s Ups and Downs’: Urška Žigart Building Results with Experience
content:
Slovenian rider talks about her progression in the sport, making up for lost time, and how she and two-time Tour winner Tadej Pogačar support each other.

Read the full article at ‘Progress Is Not Always Linear, It’s Ups and Downs’: Urška Žigart Building Results with Experience on Velo.
author: sstokes
